title: De viaje con los Derbez
overview: The series revolves around the Derbez family on his trip to Morocco, the family is composed of Eugenio Derbez the patriarch of the family, Alessandra Rosaldo his wife, Aitana Derbez his daugther, Vadhir and Jos√© Eduardo Derbez their sons, and Aislinn Derbez his oldest daughter, along Mauricio Ochmann, and her daughter Kailani.
